title: The Goal for Every Married Couple
itunes:author: Guest: Gary Thomas
itunes:summary:
Learning how to bless your spouse is a wonderful thing. But what if you served him or her without expecting anything in return? John and the Smalleys discuss how to maintain a servant's heart through the changing seasons of marriage. Featuring Gary Thomas.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
